title: About me
description: <0>I’m Jérémy, I am a PHP/JavaScript developer based in Lyon, FR.<1></1><1></1>I’m also a voxel artist and I produce vector art occasionally. I like everything low-poly, minimalistic and retro. I use MagicaVoxel for voxels and Affinity Designer for vectors.<1></1><1></1>I grew up in a small town in Brittany, FR. I graduated with a Master’s degree in Agronomy. After 8 years working in this area, I decided switching career to web development.</0>

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.text: I am open to any ideas of cooperation
